cause.description:
My team for they Relay is Arthur's Aces we walk in memory of my dad who died after multiple battles with multiple myeloma. Arthur Scagel 1941-2006 Rest in Peace
1. Cancer effects everyone
2. Money raised gives hope to those battling cancer now
3. Cancer research is the only way we can find a cure
cause.mission: raise money for the American Cancer Society and cancer research
cause.name: Relay for Life Haverhill
